events.message: The applicant has submitted the personal loan application to cover upcoming medical expenses and debt consolidation.
Application was reviewed and categorised as a Personal Loan because it includes medical and debt-related costs.
Loan officer Ms. Gomes has been assigned to the case to guide the applicant through the personal loan process.
The loan officer completed the initial review and noted some discrepancies in income details needing clarification.
Additional documents including medical bills, proof of income, and debt statements have been requested from the applicant.
Applicant successfully submitted all requested documents, including detailed medical invoices and debt payoff letters.
Credit report was obtained showing the applicant has a reasonable credit score with some past debts recently cleared.
Risk team analyzed the credit and financial info, concluding that the loan request carries a moderate risk profile.
A loan offer including interest rates, payment schedule, and terms was presented to the applicant for review.
Applicant responded positively to the offer and requested clarification on payment options before final approval.
Due to query on payment flexibility, the application was escalated to senior loan management for further review.
Senior management approved the personal loan with adjusted terms that accommodate the applicant’s payment preferences.
Funds were successfully transferred to the applicant’s account to cover medical expenses and debt repayment as requested.
Follow-up with the applicant confirmed satisfaction with loan terms and no further assistance required at this time.
The loan application process has been officially closed after successful funding and follow-up without issues.
